title: Welcome To Other Gentle Worlds
alternative_title: Yasashi Isekai e Youkoso;Hero's First Love;Hero's First Woman;Welcome to a Kinder, Different World;Welcome to Other Gentle Worlds;Yuusha no Hajimete no Hito;優し異世界へようこそ;勇者のはじめてのひと
status: Yasashi Isekai e Youkoso;Hero's First Love;Hero's First Woman;Welcome to a Kinder, Different World;Welcome to Other Gentle Worlds;Yuusha no Hajimete no Hito;優し異世界へようこそ;勇者のはじめてのひと
description:
Description :
        A collection of short stories about different lives in other "gentle" worlds by (https://mangadex.org/search?author=Ichitomo%20Kazutomo).    These were originally oneshots from the author's (https://twitter.com/burningblossom) and (https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/789788). Now, they are being collected into volumes.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.2 Chapter 11: The Hero And The Forest Thugs
Vol.2 Chapter 10: The Fantasy "other World" Red Mark Bus Line
Vol.1 Chapter 9: Give A Demon An Iron Club
Vol.1 Chapter 8: The Story Of A Certain Mother And Child
Vol.11 Chapter 6: The Journey Of A Weakling Hero And A Monster
Vol.1 Chapter 5: The Irritable General Who Guards The Gate Of The Toll Bridge
Vol.12 Chapter 4: I Am A Fan
Vol.1 Chapter 3: A Kiss From The Prince Was Not Needed Because The Princess Was Able To Hold Her Own Against The Queen’S Pursuit With Her Own Strength
Vol.1 Chapter 1: The Tale Of Momotarou When The Old Man And Old Woman Were Over-Powerful
